name: subperiod
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a period of time that is part of a particular longer period of time: We divided the study into three periods: the entire 12-year period, the most recent 6-year subperiod and the most recent 3-year subperiod . Just like the main periods, each sub-period is characterized by the particular qualities and significations of the ruling planets.
More examplesFewer examplesThe bedrock was formed during the Pennsylvanian geologic subperiod.In which planetary period and subperiod are you?A new suffixless intensifier, pretty, surfaced in the last subperiod, 1640-1710.
